Articles.Content: Ok so I downloaded the procedural wings mod and when I try to use it nothing happens. I don't know if I am just pressing the wrong buttons or if I installed it wrong. How do I properly install it and what are the controls? I am using a mac.

Which procedural wing mod are you useing and which mods are you useing?

Currently I can't get the B9 procedural wings to work with out FAR (and FAR is causing me some bugs on its own) but I can get most of the parts  in Procedural Dynamics to work.
